note.webauthn: You will see a popup message about a security key above. This appears because Yoroi uses the WebAuthn API. Please disregard the message and DO NOT INTERACT with the above window.
title.sendTx: Send Transaction Using Ledger Hardware Wallet
title.verifyAddress: Verify Address on Ledger Hardware Wallet
hint.common.pinCode: Enter your PIN on your Ledger device, using the RIGHT and LEFT buttons to select each number and then BOTH buttons to confirm.
